sentences.sContent: Taller buildings also tended to taper inwards, further reducing rentable space; the cost of moving materials and people also soars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Taller buildings also tended to taper inwards, further reducing rentable space; the cost of moving materials and people also soars.
sentences.sCn: 更高建筑的内部也开始变尖了，进一步减少了可出租的空间；运人运货的成本也直线上升。

sentences.sContent: There are a few dive shops in Massawa with rentable gear and boats to take you to the Dahlak Archipelago, which includes more than 200 islands and dozens of wrecks.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are a few dive shops in Massawa with rentable gear and boats to take you to the Dahlak Archipelago, which includes more than 200 islands and dozens of wrecks.
sentences.sCn: 在马萨瓦有几家经营潜水的商店，有全套潜水装备出租，还有船只可载你前往达拉克群岛，周围有200多个岛屿和十几个沉船遗址。

sentences.sContent: A mobile population needs rentable homes.
sentences.sCn: 一个移动性人口需要的就是能够租得起的房子。

words.tran: 承租人；佃户；房东；（英）影片出租商
